languages.text: {n}Люди в страхе отшатываются и начинают озираться. В воцарившейся неразберихе вам удается ускользнуть прочь.{/n}
{n}The people recoil in fear and cast anxious glances about them. You make use of the confusion to successfully sneak away.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Люди в страхе отшатываются и начинают озираться. В воцарившейся неразберихе вам удается ускользнуть прочь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The people recoil in fear and throw anxious glances around them. You make use of the confusion to successfully slip away.{/n}
{n}The people recoil in fear and throw anxious glances around them. You make use of the confusion to successfully slip away.{/n}
{n}The people recoil in fear and cast anxious glances about them. You make use of the confusion to successfully slip away.{/n}
{n}The people recoil in fear and cast anxious glances about them. You make use of the confusion to successfully slip away.{/n}
{n}The people recoil in fear and cast anxious glances about them. You make use of the confusion to successfully sneak away.{/n}
{n}The people recoil in fear and cast anxious glances about them. You make use of the confusion to successfully sneak away.{/n}

languages.text: {n}听了你的话，三个人惊惧不已，向后退去，焦虑地环顾四周，而你在一片混乱之中趁机抽身。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people recoil in fear and cast anxious glances about them. You make use of the confusion to successfully sneak away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}听了你的话，三个人惊惧不已，向后退去，焦虑地环顾四周，而你在一片混乱之中趁机抽身。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La gente retrocede, asustada, y mira a su alrededor nerviosa. Aprovechas la confusión para escabullirte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people recoil in fear and cast anxious glances about them. You make use of the confusion to successfully sneak away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La gente retrocede, asustada, y mira a su alrededor nerviosa. Aprovechas la confusión para escabullirte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İnsanlar korkuyla geri çekiliyor, etraflarına endişeli bakışlar atıyorlar. Kargaşadan faydalanarak başarıyla sıvışıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people recoil in fear and cast anxious glances about them. You make use of the confusion to successfully sneak away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İnsanlar korkuyla geri çekiliyor, etraflarına endişeli bakışlar atıyorlar. Kargaşadan faydalanarak başarıyla sıvışıyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}人々は恐怖で後ずさりして、不安げな視線を向ける。あなたは混乱に乗じてひっそりと逃げることに成功する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people recoil in fear and cast anxious glances about them. You make use of the confusion to successfully sneak away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}人々は恐怖で後ずさりして、不安げな視線を向ける。あなたは混乱に乗じてひっそりと逃げることに成功する。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La foule recule subitement et jette des regards inquiets alentours. Vous profitez de la confusion générale pour vous éclipser.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people recoil in fear and cast anxious glances about them. You make use of the confusion to successfully sneak away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La foule recule subitement et jette des regards inquiets alentours. Vous profitez de la confusion générale pour vous éclipser.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Leute schrecken ängstlich zurück und blicken sich nervös um. Du nutzt die Verwirrung, um dich davonzuschleichen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people recoil in fear and cast anxious glances about them. You make use of the confusion to successfully sneak away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Leute schrecken ängstlich zurück und blicken sich nervös um. Du nutzt die Verwirrung, um dich davonzuschleichen.{/n}
